name: CreateAnnotation
description:
Create a new annotation for a project.

Use this tool to create a new annotation within a specified project in Datadog. This can be used to track important events or notes related to project data.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project where the annotation will be created. Obtain it via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: annotation_details
parameters.description: The details of the annotation to be created, including ID, content, date, creation type, and related dashboard/insight information.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
